name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Merlin - Ask AI to Research, Write & Review

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 26-in-1 Chrome extension to Research, Re-write, and Summarise content on any website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:

long.es,es_419,fa,gu,hi,kn,lt,lv,ml,mr,ms,no,:
Merlin is an All-in-One AI Assistant powered by GPT-4 that helps in:

1. Summarize: Get a jist of blogs, YouTube videos, research papers, and websites
2. AI Writer: Make content for social media, emails, art, code and more
3. Plugins: Get the best AI plugins on the browser (like AI Chat, Chat with PDFs, Chat with web access)

It's free to download and use. We are keeping user privacy as the priority and we are in the process of getting SOC, GDPR, and ISO compliance as well.

ğŸš€ How to use ?
ğŸ”¸Click the "Add to Chrome" button and pin it to your toolbar.
ğŸ”¸Log into your account.
ğŸ”¸Press Cmd/Ctrl+M to activate Merlin.
ğŸ”¸Get started with AI!

ğŸ’» Feature Highlights:
ğŸ’¡ AI Chat: Open the Sidebar to start chat & ask about anything easily.
ğŸ’¡ Copywriting: Easily create social content, blogs, and ad copies.
ğŸ’¡ ChatPDF: Summarize or Chat with any PDF to get concise information & save time.
ğŸ’¡ WebChat: Summarize or Chat with any website content to read what matters.
ğŸ’¡ Grow your audience on LinkedIn & Twitter - Generate unique social media content and comments to increase engagement
ğŸ’¡ Search Enhance: Get concise AI answers next to search tools like Google, Bing, Baidu, or Yahoo.
ğŸ’¡ Web Access: Get the right content with real-time internet access.
ğŸ’¡ AI replies on Emails- enabling you to send appropriate responses with just a click, no typing needed.
ğŸ’¡ YouTube Video summary: Quickly summarize video content without wasting time watching long videos.
ğŸ’¡ AI Art: Convert your words into visuals.


â“ Frequently Asked Questions:

ğŸ“Œ What search engines are supported by you?
  Currently, we supports Google, Bing, DuckDuckGo, Baidu, and more search engines.

ğŸ“Œ Do I need a ChatGPT/OpenAI account?
  No, you do not need to have a Chat GPT account to use this extension. You can create an account for free on our website.

ğŸ“Œ Chat GPT is banned in my country. Does this extension work in my country?
  Yes. we are available in all countries.

ğŸ“Œ Is it free to use?
Yes, we offers 102 queries every day for free. For unlimited access, you can choose the Pro Plans when you wish to scale.

ğŸ“Œ What is the relationship between this extension and ChatGPT?
   This AI tool is built on the ChatGPT API model.

ğŸ“ª Contact us:
Any questions or suggestions? Please contact us at ğŸ’Œ support@getmerlin.in
Try Merlin AI now and experience the powerful AI assistants.
